Method Detail

isTableRefreshing

static boolean isTableRefreshing(String id,
                                 WebContext webContext)
There needs to be a way to tell if the table is refreshing, as opposed to being run for the first time.

Parameters:
id - The table identifier.
webContext - The web context.
Returns:
Is true if the table is being refreshed.

isClearingWorksheet

static boolean isClearingWorksheet(String id,
                                   WebContext webContext)
Parameters:
id - The table identifier.
webContext - The web context.
Returns:
Is true if the user is requesting to clear all the worksheet changes.

filterWorksheetItems

static Collection<?> filterWorksheetItems(Collection<?> items,
                                          Worksheet worksheet)
Filter the items by the rows in the worksheet.

Parameters:
items - The collection of beans or maps.
worksheet - The current worksheet.
Returns:
The filtered items.

retrieveLimit

@Deprecated
public static Limit retrieveLimit(String id,
                                             String stateAttr,
                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Deprecated. This method is not used in the core api and will be removed.

Retrieve the Limit from the State implemenation.

Parameters:
id - The table identifier.
stateAttr - The attribute used to retrieve the Limit.
request - The servlet request.
Returns:
The Limit stored by the State implementation.

initTable

public static void initTable(TableFacade tableFacade,
                             Table table)
Spin through the components and inject the proper support classes. This is kind of a mini IOC implementation.
